meanings.sent1: The rabbit had soft auricled ears.
meanings.sent2: The cat's auricled hearing was sharp.
meanings.sent3: The auricled flowers seemed to listen to the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her auricled intuition guided her through tough decisions.
meanings.sent5: The auricled shells whispered secrets of the sea.
